successes.title: Chely Wright's New Studio Album!
successes.description: Chely Wright is making a new studio album and wants YOU to be a backer. Join Chely's Kickstarter campaign and become part of her team!

Pledges.description: Thank You. Every little bit counts!
Listen to Chely's record that YOU helped make possible on your iPod while at the gym, or in your pjs in front of your laptop. Receive a digital download of the new record.
This one gets you a digital download and a copy of CD.

EQUALITY PLEDGE! You'll receive a digital download and a copy of the CD, but your pledge will be counted alongside others who support LGBT Equality. Whether you're part of the LGBT community or an amazing straight ally, this reward level will reflect your support for Chely's advocacy and the final tally of this pledge level will be a powerful statement.
Receive a digital download and Chely will autograph copy of the new CD for you.

LIKE ME. Receive an autographed copy of Chely's memoir, LIKE ME book and digital download of the new album.
*Book will be delivered to you by Oct 2014

WISH ME AWAY. In 2011, a documentary film was made about Chely's career, her life and her coming out journey. You'll get an autographed copy of the Wish Me Away DVD and digital download of the new album.
*DVD will be delivered to you by Oct 2014
Pre-show Meet & Greet to any one show (of your choice) that you attend and a digital download of album.

YOO HOO!  Chely will record a personalized voice mail greeting exclusively for you. Includes a digital download of the CD.
*Voice recording will be done Oct  2014.
You helped make this album happen and you deserve credit.  Chely will personally list your name in the liner notes of her album. Includes a copy of the new album and digital download.

MEDIA BUNDLE. Like Me book, Wish Me Away DVD,  New CD-- all AUTOGRAPHED by Chely. Includes digital download of the album.
*Book and DVD will be delivered Oct 2014

CHELY'S ENTIRE DISCOGRAPHY-- AUTOGRAPHED.
You'll receive every CD Chely's released in her 20 year career. *Some are out of print, so they're rare and valuable.  
Chely will autograph
1. Woman In The Moon
2. Right In The Middle Of It
3. Let Me In
4. Single White Female
5. Never Love You Enough
6. Everything (includes DVD)
7. Metropolitan Hotel
8. Lifted Off The Ground
9. NEW ALBUM

*as a bonus, you'll get the CD Single of:
1. Damn Liar -- remix
2. Bumper Of My S.U.V.
Will be at your door in time for the holidays.

LET'S CHAT! To show her appreciation, Chely will have a private, 30 minute phone call. If you've ever met Chely, you know she loves to talk and she'd love to hear your story too.  Includes digital download of the new CD.

I WILL BE YOUR HACKER, BABY!
Provide your social media passwords to Chely and she will write your status updates and post pictures from YOUR account for a day. Of course, it will be clear with your followers that Chely has hacked you. FUN!!
*Digital download of album included.

PICTURE THIS! 
Chely will spend a couple of days taking pictures for YOU on a disposable camera. She'll send you the camera when she's finished. You might get photos of a day in the studio with Chely or a day on the road or maybe even a day at home with her kids. Chely lives in NYC, so there's a lot to photograph.
*Digital download of the album included.

You pick the song and Chely will hand write the lyrics to your favorite song that she's written. Pick from any of Chely's records. Includes digital download of the new CD.
*Handwritten Lyrics will be delivered Nov 2014
You and a guest are invited to a meet and greet and a pre-release listening party in NYC with Chely. Includes digital download.
*This party will happen the week of album's release.
Let's Skype. Chely will Skype with you for 30 mins. Includes digital download of album.

AUTOGRAPHED GUITAR!
Chely will sign a beautiful, brand new acoustic guitar for you.

LUNCH!  Chely will take you to lunch at one of her favorite restaurants in NYC.
Includes copy of CD and digital download.
*Lunch will take place before the end of 2014 unless arrangements are made.

LUNCH IN NASHVILLE
Chely will take you and a guest to lunch during CMA Music Fest 2015 in Nashville, TN.

Have you ever wanted to co-write a song?  You and Chely co-write a song.  This can done in person in NYC or on Skype. Includes copy of CD and digital download.
*This will take place before the end of 2014 unless arrangements are made.

BIKE RIDE!. As you might know, Chely loves riding her bike. You and Chely will ride bikes in Central Park. Two hour bike ride-- or however long it takes. Chely will sign your bike or your helmet if you'd like. Includes digital download.
*Bike ride will take place before the end of 2014 unless arrangements are made.

I'M WITH THE BAND!
Meet Chely on the road and go where she and the band go.  They'll put you to work. Come to soundcheck and be part of the crew.  If you've ever wondered what it's like to tour, you'll get a crash course. *Your hotel room will be provided. 
Of course, you'll get 2 tickets to the show and the digital download of the new album.
Chely's mgmt team will work with you to find the tour date in 2015 that works best for you.

SING ON MY RECORD
Chely will work with you in the studio to put your vocal on a song she records. To quote Chely, "This won't be a throwaway vocal, we will work on your part and find the best way to use your voice." Chely will be recording in a few different locations, so her mgmt team will work with you to  schedule your session when/where it works best for you. Recording will be in early 2015.

DINNER IN NYC
Chely will take you and a guest to dinner in NYC while her wife Lauren stays home with the boys. 
This dinner can be scheduled for 2014 or 2015-- whatever works best for you.

DINNER AND A SHOW. Chely will take you out to dinner and then to see a Broadway show in NYC. (2 guests)
*This will take place before the end of 2014 unless arrangements are made.

DOUBLE DATE: You and and a guest will have dinner with Chely and Lauren at one of their favorite restaurants in NYC. Must love food. ;)
*Dinner will take place before the end of 2014 unless arrangements are made.

FLY ON THE WALL EXPERIENCE- Come spend a day in the studio with Chely as she records and/or mixes. Sessions are usually closed, so this will be a rare treat. Just hang out, eat lunch and see how it all happens.
*The studio date will be available in 2014 and 2015, per scheduled sessions.
